name: SEO.com
description:
SEO.com is a performance-driven online marketing agency. We have more than 10 years in the search marketing industry and have worked with international Fortune 500s as well as a wide range of locally focused startups.
Every campaign is customized to meet the client’s specific needs. We perform a comprehensive analysis of the website and the competitive nature of the industry and formulate a strategy accordingly. There is no one-size-fits-all solution in online marketing, so we will create a unique strategy for your current situation.
Our services include: SEO, Social Media, Content Marketing, PPC/AdWords Campaigns, Optimized Web Design, and Conversion Optimization.
We have a long record of success with our clients because we focus on the metrics that matter – new customers, new conversions, and new sales. Modern SEO requires a comprehensive approach, and our services cover it all.
